title: The Herd-HOUR 1-Wentz, Raiders, Giants
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR 1-Wentz, Raiders, Giants
description:
People still don't give Carson Wentz the respect he deserves

It might be time to take the Raiders seriously

The Giants are improving, the Cowboys are not


Guest: Doug Flutie
